abstract: End of college football regular season sees unusually high turnover at colleges across country, including at Rutgers, where coach Kyle Flood and athletic director Julie Hermann are both fired.
lead_paragraph: On a date known as Black Friday for the number of struggling coaches that lose their jobs, Rutgers fired Coach Kyle Flood and replaced Athletic Director Julie Hermann with Patrick Hobbs. Georgia, Virginia, Virginia Tech and Iowa also made big changes.

headline.main: Rutgers Fires Its Football Coach and Athletic Director
headline.print_headline: On Dark Day for Coaches, Spotlight Is Partly on Rutgers
